channel.title: Hide you dot on minimap
channel.description: I was wondering if there is a way to hide your dot on the minimap. Because I made a hidden admin and did Pnpc to make him invisible so I could monitor my players (like new staff and stuff). But my dot on the minimap gives away where I am and they walk up to the dot and say is someone there and stuff. So is there anyway to make it so I could do a command or something and not have a dot on minimap

item.title: Hide you dot on minimap
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

that would be client-side

Read full topic
